<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Implausible Purchase (Investigator)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1477) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 65 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Predictive Purchase (Investigator)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1463)

</column>

---

It seems impossible, but you've analyzed every angle and are able to just keep pulling out exactly the item you need, even in far-flung locations. You can use [Prescient Planner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2143) even if you have already used it after purchasing goods, and you can use it as a single action instead of a 2-action activity, during which you Interact to draw the item. In addition, five times per day, you can use Prescient Planner to pull out a common [consumable item](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15) up to 6 levels lower than your level.
name: Implausible Purchase (Investigator)
